pages.text: 51|31|keat ban pol tha  dau che  neah  tae puok anak mean kechchakar avei ao  banda anakneasar( mea la ai kat)
51|32|puokke chhlaey tha  pitabrakd nasa  puok yeung trauv ban ke  banhchoun towkean krom del br pru td babakamm
51|33|daembi noam dom thm pi deiidth mk tomleak leu puokke
51|34|del chea sanhnhea mk pi mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat)samreab  puok del bampean .
51|35|haey yeung ban sangkroh banda anak mean chomnue del rsanow  knong noh( phoumi robsa lout) .
51|36|kraoyomk yeung minkheunh avei nowknong noh krawpi phteah muoy  ampi banda anak mou slei m noh laey( phteah robsa lout ning krom kruosaear  robsa keat) .
51|37|haey yeung ban bansaoltouk nowknong phoumisrok noh nouv phosdo- tang muoy samreab banda anak del kaotakhlach tearounakamm da chhucheab .
51|38|haey nowknong rueng mousaea  nowpel del yeung ban banhchoun  ke towkean hvie r aon cheamuoynung mou chi hsaa t da chbasaleasa( ka chea  phosdo tang muoy der) .
51|39|kraoyomk ke( hvie r aon) ban berchenh( pi chomnue)chea  muoy nung kangtp robsa ke  haey ban niyeay tha  ke chea krou m nd akm  ryy chea mnoussaavikl chrit .
51|40|kraoyomk  yeung ban krabuoch ke ning polteahean robsa ke  ruoch yeung ka baoh puokke chaul tow knong samoutr  daoy ke chea anak del trauv  ke sdeibantosa .
51|41|haey nowknong rueng ad  nowpel del yeung ban banhchoun  khyalpyouh da snguot tow kamtech puokke( ka chea phosdo tang muoy der) .
51|42|vea min bansaoltouk avei laey  pel del vea ban bk baok tow  leu aveimuoy haey noh  leuklengte vea thveu aoy avei teangnoh khe  t ch khtei dauch  chea pheh .
51|43|haey nowknong rueng sa moud  nowpel del mean ke niyeay  towkean puokke tha  chaur puok anak saoysokh rhautadl pelvelea muoy  choh .
51|44|te puokke ban brachheang nung batobanhchea nei mcheasa puokke . pel  noh ronteah ban banh( samleab)puokke  khn del puokke meulkheunh  phtalnungophnek .
51|45|dau che  neah  puokke kmean samotthaphap knong kar tatl( nung tearounakamm) laey  haey puokke ka min ach chuoy khluoneng ban der .
51|46|haey( yeung ban bamphlanh) krom nuo h moun puokke towtiet .  pitabrakd nasa  puokke kuchea krom del thleab lmeusa nung batobanhchea robsa  a l laoh .
51|47|haey mekh  yeung ban bangkeut vea daoy anoupheap robsa yeung  phtal .  haey pitabrakd nasa  yeung chea anak thveu aoy vea thom touleay .
51|48|haey phendei yeung ban thveu aoy vea reabasmae .  haey yeung chea anak  kral vea yeang la braneit .
51|49|haey real avei  teangoasa  yeung ban bangkeut aoy mean chea kou   daembi puok anak nukkheunh( pi anoupheap robsa a l laoh) .

51|50|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak branhab branhal tralbtow kan  a l laoh( anouvotd tam batobanhchea)choh  pitabrakd nasa khnhom chea anak  dasatuen promean da chbasaleasa pi trong samreab puok anak .
51|51|haey chaur puok anak kom yk mcheasa phe  sa ng mk korp sakkar ruom  cheamuoy a l laoh aoy saoh  .  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom chea anak dasatuen  promean da chbasaleasa pi trong samreab puok anak .
